title: Ora Kannaala Lyrics Udhayam NH4 Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Movie: Udhayam NH4
Singer: Gaana Bala
Music: GV Prakash Kumar
Lyrics: Gaana Bala		 Other Songs Lyrics
Ora Kannala
Yaaro Ivan
Maalai Pon Maalai
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Ora kannaala enna oram katturaa
Jaada Kaatiye romba vaati vadhaikuraa
vaana villaatam vandhu yetti paakuraa
valachi poten da oru sokku figurada

Ariyaa vayasula, alava saisula
anna nada nadandhu varraa kadalu mannula
naalu molam road-ula nada oru dhinusula
satham pottu signal tharraa velli kolusula

Light house-u velachathapola kaaturaada jaalam
Manasukulla pulli vachi poduraada kolam

Maadi veetula oru pulli maanudaa
kedachi pochudaa naan ketta peiece-u da
velli kolusula pudhu satham pottuthaan
chinna manasthaan ava valachu pottuta

Kadhal pannum sokkula
kattu maram gapula
kaasimedu kadalu manula veedu katturaa
alayulaa kadula thudupula padagula
aadu puli aatam thaaney aadi kaaturaa

Adaki pudikka mudiyaadha vangakadal kudhira
Octopus meena pola vandhutaada yedhira

Ora kannaala enna oram katturaa
Jaada Kaatiye romba vaati vadhaikuraa
vaana villaatam vandhu yetti paakuraa
valachi poten da oru sokku figurada

Maayakannaala prabhuva mayaki paathava
maatti thavikuraa ippa veetu siraiyula
andha figaru mogathathaan
ivan paaka mudiyala
ava velli kulusula ippa satham ketkala

Paasamennum valayila maatikittu thavikuraa
aadharavaa avaluku angae yaarumillada
naalu peru serndhutaa
rendu pera pirichitaa
kaadhal enna kaatriniley
kalaindhu pogumaa

Soagatha nee kaatulathaan
paraka vidu nanbaa
Un machaan serthu vappaan nee beera
kudi thembaa

English Translation
I tried my best :)
[english lyric]
